turkish_example_sentence: Onlar önemli bilgileri yetkili memura hastanede söylemiş olsalardı sorun çözülürdü
english_example_sentence: If they had said the important information to the authorized officer at the hospital the problem would have been solved
russian_example_sentence: Если бы они сказали важную информацию уполномоченному сотруднику в больнице, проблема была бы решена
